title: Creates a Quarkus project in the workspace

name.description: Name of the project to generate.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

x-prompt.message: What kind of project are you generating?
Which build system would you like to use?

groupId.x-prompt: What groupId would you like to use?

artifactId.x-prompt: What artifactId would you like to use?

skipFormat.x-prompt: Skip code formatting support(using Spotless plugin)?

extensions.description: Extensions to use in the project(comma-separated). Follow this guide https://t.ly/S6sk for more instructions on how to proceed.

transformIntoMultiModule.description: Transform the project into a multi-module project. Follow this guide https://t.ly/TmKF- for more information.

addToExistingParentModule.description: Add the project into an existing parent module project. Follow this guide https://t.ly/TmKF- for more information.

parentModuleName.description: Name of the parent module to create or to add child project into.

keepProjectLevelWrapper.description: Keep the `Maven` or `Gradle` wrapper files from child project (when generating a multi-module project). Follow this guide https://t.ly/TmKF- for more information.

quarkusInitializerUrl.description: The URL to the Quarkus Initializer instance to use to generate the project.

proxyUrl.description: The URL of the (corporate) proxy server to use to access Quarkus Initializer.

skipCodeSamples.x-prompt: Would you like to include code samples from extensions (when available)?

version.description: Version of the project to generate.

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting).

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed.
